availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ezekiel H. Wood (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer & wholesale dealer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer and wholesale dealer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ellen Power Wood in Mason County on September 7, 1853. Farmer with John T. Wood in Mason County in 1850. Wholesale dealer as E. H. Wood & Co. in Mason County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 1, p. 6A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, 1851-1864, Film #000281844, p. 285 of 444 of microfilm.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 15, Mason County, Kentucky, 1862, p. 35 of 754 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
